snippet: While record outside spending affected the election in innumerable ways, the prizes most sought by the emerging class of megadonors remained outside their grasp.
abstract: Megadonors have little to show for flood of cash that was funneled into 2012 presidential election; outside spending affected election in innumerable ways, but Republican donors hoping for return on their investments are crushed by Pres Obama's return to the White House and strengthening by Democrats on their lock on the Senate.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and JESS BIDGOOD

lead_paragraph: While record outside spending affected the election in innumerable ways, the prizes most sought by the emerging class of megadonors remained outside their grasp.

headline.seo: Little to Show for Cash Flood by Big Donors
headline.main: Little to Show for Cash Flood by Big Donors
headline.print_headline: Little to Show For Cash Flood By Big Donors

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
